reviewText:
I was able to watch this dvd on my computer, by changing the region. I like Joanna Lumley's travel stories very much.  It did have a lot of preliminaries until it finally got to the Lights.  For someone who is never going to see the Lights, this was a good substitute.

University of North Alaska has another dvd about the Northern Lights, which has more of the Lights and explains how the lights come about.
The DVD did not play on my player. It was nowhere mentioned that this format is not for N American players.
